TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawTreeNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件中的节点的外观进行自定义使用所有者描述的控件。Use the event to customize the appearance of nodes in a control using owner drawing. 引发事件控制其属性设置为或并显示或更新一个节点。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to or and a node is displayed or updated. 传递到事件处理程序包含有关要绘制以及提供方法，以帮助您绘制节点的节点的信息。The passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node. 使用或属性，以检索有关要绘制的节点的信息。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the node to draw. 使用属性来进行实际绘制由指定的区域内属性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要使绘制不需要为所有者描述的节点的操作系统，设置属性设置为`true`。To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the property to `true`. 当属性设置为，所指示的区域属性包括仅在节点的标签部分。When the property is set to , the area indicated by the property includes the label portion of the node only. 当属性设置为，则区域包含整个节点，包括图标、 复选框、 加号和减号情况下，通常使用的区域和行连接节点。When the property is set to , the area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 此外，处理程序事件提供命中测试。Additionally, a handler for the event provides hit-testing. 默认情况下，可以通过单击其标签周围的区域选择节点。By default, a node can be selected only by clicking the region around its label. 事件处理程序选择一个节点，此区域内或节点标记，围绕区域内任意位置单击，如果存在。The event handler selects a node that is clicked anywhere within this region or within the region around a node tag, if present. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets the size and location of the to draw.

value.span: 表示要绘制的 的界限的 。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的位置是相对于左上角的控件。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 当属性设置为，指定的区域属性是在其中可单击一个节点以选择它的区域。When the property is set to , the area specified by the property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it. 如果绘制此命中的测试区域外，应选择该节点，单击它的可见区域时提供你自己的代码。If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked. 您可能还想要提供命中的测试代码时属性设置为。You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the property is set to . 在此模式下，属性包含整个节点的整个宽度范围内控制，而不是只命中的测试区域。In this mode, the property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the control, rather than the just hit test region. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DrawDefault { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DrawDefault : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否将由操作系统绘制 ，而不是所有者描述。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.

value.span: 如果节点将由操作系统进行绘制，则为 ；如果节点将由事件处理程序进行绘制，则为 。

span.span: if the node should be drawn by the operating system; if the node will be drawn in the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`您不想要自定义在处理时的节点事件。Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the event. 例如，这是有用时想要自定义都处于特定状态的节点。For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制节点标记和自定义突出显示手动为所选节点的颜色。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tag and a custom highlight color manually for the selected node. 未选择的节点不需要自定义。Nodes that are not selected do not need customization. 对于未选定节点，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制，并且不会有自定义的外观。For unselected nodes, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system and will not have a customized appearance. > [!NOTE] > 如果绘制节点设置手动和还属性设置为`true`，部分或全部所绘制的内容可能会覆盖操作系统。If you draw a node manually and also set the property to `true`, some or all of what you draw may be overwritten by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取用于绘制 的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object used to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的属性和用于在显示设备上绘制的有用方法。The class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于访问对象来绘制。Use this property to access the object to draw. 时，此操作很有用属性不提供足够信息以满足你的需求。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性提供您可以使用，例如，若要确定节点是否为选定、 选中，或者已设定焦点的基本状态信息。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 属性，但是，可以访问的所有成员对象。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the object. 您必须在节点直接访问，例如，当你想要确定其扩展状态。You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CPP/treeviewownerdraw.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/CS/treeviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TreeViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewOwnerDraw/VB/treeviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the to draw.

value.span: 值的按位组合，指示 的当前状态。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values indicating the current state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以检查是否对象中要绘制处于特定状态。Use this property to check whether the object to draw is in a particular state. 此属性提供有关节点的基本状态信息。This property provides only basic state information about the node. 可以使用此属性，例如，若要确定节点是否为选定、 选中，或者已设定焦点。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused. 如果您需要了解的详细信息，检索通过节点属性。If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the property. 例如，若要确定是否已展开节点，您必须检索的节点并检查属性。For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义使用所有者描述的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to customize a control using owner drawing. 在示例中的控件将显示标准节点标签以及可选节点标记。The control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. 使用指定节点标记属性。Node tags are specified using the property. 控件还使用自定义颜色，包括自定义突出显示颜色。The control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color. 你可以自定义的大多数设置颜色的颜色属性，但不能作为属性的选择突出显示颜色。You can customize most of the colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. 此外，默认选择突出显示矩形将扩展仅围绕节点标签。Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. 若要绘制的节点标记并绘制自定义突出显示矩形足够大以容纳一个节点标记，则必须使用所有者描述。Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag. 在示例中，处理程序节点标记和自定义选择突出显示手动事件绘制。In the example, a handler for the event draws the node tags and the custom selection highlight manually. 未选定的节点不需要自定义。Unselected nodes do not need customization. 对于这些数据，属性设置为`true`，以便它们将由操作系统绘制。For these, the property is set to `true` so that they will be drawn by the operating system. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
